results.title: Sunon Elevates Design and Sustainable Innovation in North America with its Exclusive Chicago Showroom Opening
results.description: A New Hub for Luxury and Sustainable Workspaces CHICAGO, June 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Sunon, a global leading furniture solution provider for the work environment, is proud to announce a decisive milestone in its North American expansion: the inauguration of its second, state-of-the-art U.S. showroom, located in Chicago's prestigious Fulton Market district. This event, coinciding with the celebrated Fulton Market Design Days 2025, represents not only a geographical expansion but the consolidation of a vision that merges luxury design with an unwavering commitment to sustainability and well-being. Sunon Chicago Showroom--The space is filled with natural light, incorporating greenery and sustainable materials—fully reflecting Sunon’s commitment to well-being and sustainability. Sunon's new Chicago address complements its headquarters in Irvine, California, and reinforces a robust infrastructure that includes an R&D team in Los Angeles, world-class manufacturing in Monterrey, Mexico, and a warehousing hub in Dallas. This elite network enables Sunon to swiftly respond to global trends, redefining hybrid work models and meeting the growing demand for solutions that prioritize sustainability and employee well-being. "Chicago is a strategic foothold that connects us more directly with design professionals, corporate partners, and high-profile clients across the region," stated Cindy Shi, Managing Director of Sunon Global. "It is a platform to demonstrate how our user-centered vision, rooted in sustainability, redefines the changing realities of workspaces, blending functionality with the most refined aesthetics". The Sunon showroom in Chicago is a showcase of design excellence, featuring innovations that set industry benchmarks. Highlights include the ergonomic and sophisticated H7 chair, the agile MixCube series, designed for the fluidity of hybrid work environments, and the emblematic H5 chair. The latter is a tangible testament to Sunon's commitment to responsible materials and circular design, with a seat frame crafted from recycled marine plastics. Every piece reflects a dedication to design that honors flexibility, human well-being, and environmental responsibility. As part of the grand opening, Sunon hosted an exclusive Co-Design Workshop, inviting prominent figures from the design and business communities to personalize the H5 chair. 'What began as a single seat now tells a story of collaboration and a deep connection to the planet,' said Cindy Shi. 'Tonight's creations reflect a simple truth: sustainability isn't a slogan—it's the foundation of how we innovate. By co-creating, we're designing furniture and leading a movement where responsibility and creativity share the same blueprint". Beyond an impeccable collection, Sunon's showroom offers immersive experiences, from luxury material samples to personalized consultations for space planning. This enclave in a neighborhood renowned for its creative effervescence and design influence stands as a hub for community dialogue, industry collaboration, and the celebration of cultural events. With an ecosystem that melds global expertise with keen local insight, Sunon is poised to set unprecedented standards for luxury workspace environments across North America. About Sunon Sunon is a global leader in workspace solutions, committed to creating inspiring, human-centered environments through innovative design and smart functionality. With a presence in over 130 countries, Sunon combines technology, sustainability, and aesthetics to create spaces where ideas flourish. Whether it's corporate offices, educational settings, or co-living spaces, Sunon helps people work, learn, and live better.Learn more at: sunonglobal.comInstagram: @sunonfurnitureLinkedIn: Sunon Global

results.title: مجموعة الهلال.. سالزبورغ يستهل مشواره بفوز على باتشوكا في كأس العالم للأندية
creator: فيلادلفيا ـــ (أ ف ب)
results.description: استهلّ سالزبورغ النمساوي مشواره في كأس العالم للأندية بكرة القدم بالفوز على باتشوكا المكسيكي 2-1 الأربعاء، على ملعب تي كيو آل ضمن منافسات المجموعة الثامنة.وتصدر سالزبورغ المجموعة بعد تعادل الهلال وريال مدريد الإسباني 1-1 في وقت سابق.وشهدت المباراة توقفا لمدة ساعة ونصف خلال الشوط الثاني بسبب سوء الأحوال الجوية في منطقة سينسيناتي.وسبق أن شهدت المسابقة تأخر انطلاق مباراة ماميلودي صنداونز الجنوب إفريقي أمام أولسان الكوري الجنوبي الثلاثاء، لأكثر من ساعة بسبب تحذير من عاصفة في أورلاندو.وكان باتشوكا الطرف البادئ بالخطورة حين تصدى الحارس كريستيان تسافيشيتسكي لمحاولة القائد الفنزويلي سالومون روندون من زاوية ضيقة (10).وتألق الحارس الشاب البالغ 18 عاما في التصدي مجددا لتسديدة إلياس مونتييل (11)، قبل أن يفرض فريقه سيطرة نسبية على منتصف الشوط، من دون أن يشكّل خطورة.وواصل تسافيشيتسكي تألقه بتصديه لرأسية روندون التي ارتطمت بالعارضة (31).ومنح أوسكار غلوخ الفريق النمساوي التقدم بتسديدة من خارج منطقة الجزاء (42).وتواصل تألق تسافيشيتسكي بعد الاستراحة بست دقائق عندما تصدى لانفراد من روندون وتسديدته الضعيفة (52).وتوقفت المباراة في الدقيقة 55 بسبب سوء الأحوال الجوية قبل أن تُستأنف بعد ساعة ونصف، حيث أدرك باتشوكا التعادل من ركلة حرة مباشرة جميلة سجلها براين غونساليس (56).إلا أن سالزبورغ أعاد التقدم لصالحه بهدف البديل كريم أونيسيوو بعد سلسلة من التمريرات أكملها المهاجم برأسية (76).
